001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.SupportedDevices;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.RenameIDPResponse;
011
012/**
013 * Updates the Insulin Delivery Profile with the given idpId with a new profile name.
014 */
015/**
016 * Updates the Insulin Delivery Profile with the given idpId with a new profile name.
017 *
018
019 *
020 * <br>
021 *
022 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.RenameIDPResponse}, opCode -88, size 19
023 *
024 * <br>
025 *
026 * 
027 * <table border='1'>
028 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
029 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-88</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
030 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>19</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
031 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
032 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
033 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
034 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.RenameIDPResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
035 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>modifiesInsulinDelivery</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>supportedDevices</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.SupportedDevices#MOBI_ONLY}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
037 * </table>
038 */@MessageProps(
039    opCode=-88,
040    size=19,
041    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
042    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
043    signed=true,
044    response=RenameIDPResponse.class,
045    modifiesInsulinDelivery=true,
046    supportedDevices=SupportedDevices.MOBI_ONLY
047)
048public class RenameIDPRequest extends Message { 
049    private int idpId;
050    private String profileName;
051    
052    public RenameIDPRequest() {}
053
054    /**
055     * @param idpId ID of insulin delivery profile (NOT SLOT)
056     * @param profileName new name to set on profile
057     */
058    public RenameIDPRequest(int idpId, String profileName) {
059        this.cargo = buildCargo(idpId, profileName);
060        this.idpId = idpId;
061        this.profileName = profileName;
062        
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * <table border="1">
067     * <caption>Parsed fields for RenameIDPRequest:</caption>
068     * <tr><td><code>idpId</code></td><td><code>raw[0]</code></td></tr>
069     * <tr><td><code>profileName</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readString(raw, 2, 16)</code></td></tr>
070     * </table>
071     */
072    public void parse(byte[] raw) { 
073        raw = this.removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
074        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
075        this.cargo = raw;
076        this.idpId = raw[0];
077        this.profileName = Bytes.readString(raw, 2, 16);
078    }
079
080    
081    /**
082     * <table border="1">
083     * <caption>Byte layout for RenameIDPRequest.buildCargo(...):</caption>
084     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
085     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>(byte) idpId</code></td></tr>
086     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>(byte) (1)</code></td></tr>
087     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
088     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
089     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
090     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
091     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 4]</code></td></tr>
092     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 5]</code></td></tr>
093     * <tr><td>8</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 6]</code></td></tr>
094     * <tr><td>9</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 7]</code></td></tr>
095     * <tr><td>10</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 8]</code></td></tr>
096     * <tr><td>11</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 9]</code></td></tr>
097     * <tr><td>12</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 10]</code></td></tr>
098     * <tr><td>13</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 11]</code></td></tr>
099     * <tr><td>14</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 12]</code></td></tr>
100     * <tr><td>15</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 13]</code></td></tr>
101     * <tr><td>16</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 14]</code></td></tr>
102     * <tr><td>17</td><td><code>writeString(profileName, 16) [byte 15]</code></td></tr>
103     * <tr><td>18</td><td><code>(byte) (0)</code></td></tr>
104     * </table>
105     */
106    public static byte[] buildCargo(int idpId, String profileName) {
107        return Bytes.combine(
108            new byte[]{ (byte) idpId },
109            new byte[]{ 1 },
110            Bytes.writeString(profileName, 16),
111            new byte[]{ 0 }
112        );
113    }
114    public int getIdpId() {
115        return idpId;
116    }
117    public String getProfileName() {
118        return profileName;
119    }
120    
121    
122}
